title: Ep 358: Frankly Speaking: WTW, DBD, IBM, MLP’s, MCD and a New Free Report
itunes:title: Frankly Speaking: WTW, DBD, IBM, MLP’s, MCD and a New Free Report
description:
We start today with a question from Ellen who wants to know if she missed the boat on Weight Watchers.
The next question comes from Garth asked whether the new presentation about oil is on . The answer is yes.
Justin wanted to say thanks for the Diebold idea. It’s been a big winner so far.
The next question is about IBM. It’s down a little, is it still a buy?
Ryan would like more information on oil and gas MLP’s.
Our last question today is from Taylor who wants to know if he should short McDonalds
If like to know about Frank’s special discount offers just .
And don’t forget send in your questions
